messages.message: The `Processing Files` and `Processed Files` dialog covers our `Add Files` button in Converse. Since the processed files dialog doesn't dismiss either, this makes adding more files hard to discover and one more click away.
This seemed to be best position at the time and consistent with build app. Any suggestions?

Yup, agree that consistency with Build is important. @alagu I wonder if we should also move `Add Files` to be more consistent with Build? Alternately, should we auto-dismiss the processed files dialog
When a user has uploaded a lot of files, auto-dismiss might be a hinderance for verifying the error for the files.
Yup, we could do something simple there where it auto-dismisses in 10s only if all files are successfully processed. If there's an error, it requires manual dismissal
Yes we can make file list the same as build
